NG0713:1: badzra tsan+da ka ya ba' ka tsit+ta tan tra a ga ne pra b+ha su tra /
NG0713:3: rdo rje gtum po sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud me 'od 'bar ba'i mdo //
NG0713:4: rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0713:5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na //
NG0713:6: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po gsang ba'i bdag po /
NG0713:7: byang phyogs gnod sbyin gyi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang du /
NG0713:8: gnod sbyin rdo rje gdong bzhi pa dang */
NG0713:9: yak+sha 'bar byed dang gnod sbyin ku ba re la sogs te /
NG0713:10: gnod sbyin gyi tshogs rnams dang */
NG0713:12: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang sku
NG0713:13: gsung thugs rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting
NG0713:14: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
NG0713:15: zhugs ma thag tu rdo rje 'chang gi gsung las rta mgrin sprul te /
NG0713:16: nub phyogs klu'i gnas su sprul pa mdzad nas gdug pa btul te /
NG0713:17: rdo rje 'chang gi ljags kyi steng du gnas so //
NG0713:18: thugs las khyung mthing nag sprul te /
NG0713:20: ma rnams btul nas thugs khar thim par mdzad pas /
NG0713:21: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos te /
NG0713:22: thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid tsam du gyur to //
NG0713:23: rdo rje gtum po me 'od 'bar ba'i rgyud las /
NG0713:24: gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o // // de nas
NG0713:25: gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje stan las langs te
NG0713:26: / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
NG0713:27: e ma skyes mchog gsang ba'i bdag / rdo rje 'chang ba log 'dren gshed //
NG0713:29: nyid kyi che ba bshad du gsol //
NG0713:32: nga ni thabs kyi mnyen pa mkhan //
NG0713:33: 'khor ba'i chu bor rab med las //
NG0713:34: srid gsum bsgral bar dam bcas pa //
NG0713:35: thar pa 'dod pa lam 'dir shog / nga ni gsang bdag dpa' bo ste //
NG0713:36: gdug pa klu yis zin pa la //
NG0713:37: thar par 'dod pa lam 'dir shog / nga ni yid bzhin dpa' bo ste //
NG0713:38: gang zhig gsod dang mi ldan pa //
NG0713:39: phun sum tshogs 'dod lam 'dir shog / nga ni nyon mongs zhi byed pa //
NG0713:40: bsgral ba'i zhing bcu sgrol byed pa //
NG0713:41: bstan pa bsrung 'dod lam 'dir shog / ces gsungs pas /
NG0713:42: lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
NG0713:43: gsang bdag rdo rje gtum po yi //
NG0713:44: bsnyen pa bya na ji ltar bya //
NG0713:45: sngags dang phyag rgya ji ltar lags //
NG0713:46: ting 'dzin ji ltar bsgom par bgyi //
NG0713:47: de yis 'phrin las mchod pa dang *//
NG0713:48: dbang dang dam tshig ji ltar bstan //
NG0713:50: rdo rje gtum po me 'od 'bar ba'i rgyud las /
NG0713:51: gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis ba'o //
NG0713:52: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
NG0713:53: bsnyen pa'i rim pa bya ba ni //
NG0713:54: phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob des //
NG0713:55: dben zhing dga' ba'i sa phyogs der //
NG0713:59: gsang sngags sbyor bas bgegs rnams bskrad //
NG0713:60: om badzra tsan+da maha ro sha na hri pad+mam ta
NG0713:61: kr-i ta ha ya gri ba badzra ru da tsa
NG0713:62: le tsa le sarba big+h+nan u tsa ta ya hum
NG0713:63: phat / de nas stong nyid snying rje bskyed //
NG0713:64: sprin 'dra lta bu'i byin rlabs las //
NG0713:65: rlung sogs sa bon las byung ba //
NG0713:66: brum las gzhal yas bskyed par bya //
NG0713:67: gdan stengs sku gsung thugs kyi lha //
NG0713:68: rigs lnga'i khyung dang pad+ma dang *//
NG0713:69: thugs khar thugs kyi bya khyung bskyed //
NG0713:70: gsal nas ye shes spyan drangs thim //
NG0713:71: mnyes pa'i mchod pa dbul bar bya //
NG0713:72: bcu gcig rtsa gnyis bco lnga dang *//
NG0713:73: rtags dang grangs su thems pa dang *//
NG0713:74: me 'bar bsgrub dang so so yi //
NG0713:75: rtsad bcad las la sbyar bar bya //
NG0713:76: rdo rje gtum po me 'od 'bar ba'i rgyud las /
NG0713:77: bsnyen pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o // // de nas
NG0713:78: bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge 'khor lo zhes bya
NG0713:81: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0713:84: om badzra tsan+da maha ro sha na hum phat /
NG0713:85: hri pad+mam ta kr-i ta ha ya gri ba badzra kro d+ha hu lu hu lu hum phat /
NG0713:86: om badzra kro d+ha na hum ga ru da tsa le tsa le hum phat /
NG0713:87: om bud+ha ga ru da om /
NG0713:88: om badzra ga ru da hum /
NG0713:89: om rad ga ru da tram /
NG0713:90: om pad+ma ga tu da hri /
NG0713:91: om karma ga ru da ha /
NG0713:92: na ga srog tshi ga nan rbad /
NG0713:93: lus rdul nag ma ra ya rbad /
NG0713:94: ram ram dza la dza la /
NG0713:95: shi shi rdul bun na ga ma ra ya rbad srod /
NG0713:96: om na ga shi nan na ga byer /
NG0713:97: na ga ra dza chi na ga twam /
NG0713:100: na ga ra dza ma ra ya chings /
NG0713:101: na ga ra dza srog snying rul /
NG0713:105: na ga ra dza srog snying la rtsa la pa srog rbud /
NG0713:106: pra ti sa ma ya dza na ga snying tshal pa ma 'u rbud /
NG0713:107: de ni dgug pa'i drag sngags so //
NG0713:108: de nas bcing pa'i drag sngags bzlas /
NG0713:109: gsad pa'i drag sngags 'di dag yin //
NG0713:110: klu chen rtsad nas gcad pa ni //
NG0713:111: om sa ti ti tha ga ru na bi sha de /
NG0713:112: na ga nan na ga kha tham nyi ma sa zla nan /
NG0713:117: na ga shig na ga ra na ga go la nan /
NG0713:118: na ga ra dza byer byer phatarbad //
NG0713:119: de nas yang klu btsan gdug pa can rtsad nas bcad pa 'di gsungs so //
NG0713:123: ya ma shu shu nan rbad /
NG0713:124: de nas yang klu bdud nag po rtsad nas bcad pa 'di gsungs so //
NG0713:125: nag po shu shu mgo la nan la /
NG0713:128: nag po shu shu nan rbad /
NG0713:129: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sa'i bdag po rtsad nas bcad pa'i 'di gsungs so //
NG0713:132: sa kra ma ra la rbad /
NG0713:133: de nas yang bcos ldan 'das kyis ma mo rtsad nas bcad pa 'di gsungs so //
NG0713:138: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyan rtsad @#//
NG0713:142: pu se ma ra ya rbad /
NG0713:143: de nas yang rgyal 'gong rtsad nas bcad pa'i 'di gsungs so //
NG0713:144: ra dza thang shi shi rbad /
NG0713:146: kyi ma thang kyi ma thang */
NG0713:148: ra dza ya ra ya ra rbad /
NG0713:149: so so'i sde dang dbye ba /
NG0713:150: na ga sa tre su me su ne /
NG0713:151: ra sha ra dza ma ra ya /
NG0713:153: gdug pa'i drag sngags thun gyis gsad /
NG0713:154: khrag sna tshogs pa'i thun khrag sbyar /
NG0713:155: ban tras trag thum ni la rbad /
NG0713:156: a na sa su ra ya na su me pha tra /
NG0713:157: na ga rag sha tshal pa ma ra ya /
NG0713:159: na ga sa te pu ne na ga rag sha tshal pa ma ra ya phat rbad /
NG0713:160: gdug pa'i shing la thun phur bya /
NG0713:161: ki li ki li ya na ga sa tri phu me /
NG0713:162: rag sha sarba big+h+nan bam hum phat rbad /
NG0713:163: rdo phyes gzhi byas lcags phyes brab /
NG0713:165: na ga sa kra su ma /
NG0713:166: rak+sha ra dza ma ra ya phat rbad /
NG0713:167: sngags kyi grong khyer 'di phyung bas /
NG0713:168: 'phrin las kyis 'gro ba 'dul bar gyur to //
NG0713:169: rdo rje gtum po me 'od 'ba' ba'i rgyud las /
NG0713:170: gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u bzhi pa'o //    // de nas gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pas /
NG0713:171: nyid kyi che ba'i gsang sngags klu rigs bzhi las 'byung bar bzhed nas /
NG0713:172: dbang du bsdus la gsad pa 'di gsungs so //
NG0713:173: om na ga ra dza ban dur ma ra ya na ga thum ril ril //
NG0713:175: na ga ma ra ya phat /
NG0713:177: rgyal rigs rtsad nas bcad do //
NG0713:178: om na ga yam trig nan /
NG0713:179: na ga du ma ra ya dza la dza la /
NG0713:180: di ring di ring phur phur sod /
NG0713:181: ces gsungs pas bram ze'i rigs mes bsregs so //
NG0713:182: om na ga ma ra ya thum thum shig shig rbad /
NG0713:184: rje rigs rnams mes bsregs so //
NG0713:185: om ma ti ya ma na /
NG0713:186: na ga ma ra ya thum ril /
NG0713:189: gdol pa yid kyis myos su bcug go / sngags kyi 'phreng ba de rnams byung bas /
NG0713:190: rigs bzhi'i nad kyis zin pa rtog pa las grol lo //
NG0713:192: rigs bzhi gsang ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o // //
NG0713:193: de nas gsang ba'i bdag po gtum pos gsang sngags
NG0713:194: don yod par bya ba'i phyir //
NG0713:195: ting nge 'dzin 'di ched du brjod do //
NG0713:196: dang po stong pa byang chub sems //
NG0713:197: gnyis pa rdo rje khyab brdal lo //
NG0713:198: gsum pa rgyu yig rang byung hum //
NG0713:199: yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor brdal khyab pas //
NG0713:200: rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang *//
NG0713:202: gdan stengs rang bzhin hum las ni //
NG0713:204: de las phra mo lnga rab 'dus pa las //
NG0713:205: rdo rje 'chang ba bsang ba'i bdag / mthin nag 'jigs tshul rdo rje g.yas //
NG0713:206: gdug pa 'jigs byed sdigs mdzub g.yon //
NG0713:210: thugs dkar ri bong can stengs su //
NG0713:211: khrom las thugs kar khyung nag po //
NG0713:212: gdug pa gdol pa zas su za //
NG0713:214: 'dod pa don byas dngos grub bsul //
NG0713:215: 'dod pas gzi byin bdag la thim //
NG0713:216: bde chen 'khor lo rigs lnga'i khyung //
NG0713:217: rigs bzhi'i lus srog dbang du sdud //
NG0713:218: 'bur lha rgyan cha snyan cha mgur //
NG0713:219: rang lus sku gsung thugs su gsal //
NG0713:220: lte ba mdzod pu gnas dag tu //
NG0713:221: ram drug me yi sa bon gyis //
NG0713:222: rang byung me 'bar gdug pa bsreg / gru gsum drag po hom khung du //
NG0713:223: gdug pa bkug la bsdam zhing bstim //
NG0713:224: thugs la rdo rje lcags kyu yis //
NG0713:225: rdzas la bkug la a yis bstim //
NG0713:226: rtsad bcad sngags gzer me yi thun //
NG0713:227: gang la bya ba bsreg pa'o //
NG0713:228: gso gsad dgug gzhug las sna tshogs //
NG0713:232: gtum po me 'bar gyi dgongs pa'i le'u ste drug
NG0713:233: pa'o // // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo
NG0713:234: rje 'dzin pa'i spyan sngar gnod sbyin yak+sha 'bar byed
NG0713:235: kyis rang gi srog gi snying po 'di phul lo
NG0713:236: // om ma ha yak+sha a ti pha ti na dan ku pa phat /
NG0713:237: ces mdangos gsol du phul te /
NG0713:238: lcags phye zangs phye la sngags te gdug pa la brab na myur du sgrol bar 'gyur ro //
NG0713:239: de nas gnod sbyin ku be ras rang gi srog gi snying po phul ba /
NG0713:240: om ma ha yak+sha rad na sa ti push+tim swa ha /
NG0713:241: zhes gdongs gsol du phul lo //
NG0713:242: ga'u'i nang du zas kyi bye brag la sngags te zos na nor dang ldan zhes bya'o //
NG0713:244: 'khor gyis srog snying phul ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ///
NG0713:245: / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
NG0713:246: mnan pa las kyi cho ga las //
NG0713:247: de yi sbyor ba 'di ltar bya //
NG0713:248: 'khor lo rdo rje lte bar bri //
NG0713:249: 'og tu gang yin ming du gzugs //
NG0713:250: steng du ri rab mu khyud bskor //
NG0713:251: om lam lte bar bri bar bya //
NG0713:252: mu khyud sngags mgo nang bstan bri //
NG0713:253: de steng rdo rje rgya gram bri //
NG0713:254: gnyan pa'i sa la mnan pa bya //
NG0713:255: mchod rten sngon po khru gang bya //
NG0713:256: de la lha bskyed yig 'bru dgod //
NG0713:257: rab gnas byas la de yis mnan //
NG0713:258: bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal bya //
NG0713:259: gom gsum bor la bdag rjes gcad //
NG0713:260: bskal pa'i mthar yang thar pa med //
NG0713:262: mnan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ///
NG0713:263: / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
NG0713:264: sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga ni //
NG0713:265: gru gsum rdo rje thal chen blugs //
NG0713:266: tsher nag yam shing dug dang khrag / rdzas rngas dgra bo'i gzugs byas la //
NG0713:267: gdul bya bkug la gzugs la bstim //
NG0713:268: me lha bskyed la dgug gzhug bya //
NG0713:269: mchod gsol byin brlabs dbang bskur ro //
NG0713:270: las mthun sbyin sreg sngags 'di las //
NG0713:271: sarba sha trum che ge mo ma ra ya rbad /
NG0713:274: thal ba chu bo'i gzhung la 'o //
NG0713:275: rdo rje 'chang yang sreg nus na //
NG0713:276: gdug pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
NG0713:278: sbyin sreg gi le'u ste dgu pa'o //    // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
NG0713:279: rdo rje 'chang la dbang bskur na //
NG0713:280: sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yis //
NG0713:281: slob ma theg pa mchog dga' la //
NG0713:282: slob dpon sngags dang rgyud mchog shes //
NG0713:283: dang po sa sbyang bsrung ba bya //
NG0713:284: lha dang las kyi bum pa rnams //
NG0713:285: sngon du sta gon la gnas pas //
NG0713:287: dbus su gtum po rtsibs la khyung *//
NG0713:288: sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyang dgod //
NG0713:289: bum pa mchod rdzas khrem pa dang *//
NG0713:290: dkyil 'khor bskyed la slob ma gzhug / lha dbab
NG0713:291: nan tan dam tshig bsgrag / om rdo rje 'chang
NG0713:292: la gsang ba'i bdag / log 'dren 'dul byed bgegs
NG0713:293: kyi gshed // rdo rje sku yi gtso bor shog
NG0713:294: / om badzra tsan+da ma ha ro sha na ka
NG0713:296: nub phyogs klu yi pho brang du //
NG0713:297: gar dbang rdo rje gsung gi bdag / rdo rje 'chang bas dbang bskur bas //
NG0713:298: rdo rje gsung gi gtso bor shog / ha ya gri ba pad+mam ta krita a b+hi shiny+tsa am /
NG0713:299: gdug byed klu yi gnyen por ni //
NG0713:300: thugs las bya khyung sprul pa yis //
NG0713:301: rigs bzhi'i klu rnams dbang sdud pa //
NG0713:302: sku rnams 'dul ba'i gnyen por shog / om badzra ga ru da a b+hi shiny+tsa hum /
NG0713:303: de nas bum chus rigs lnga'i khyung *//
NG0713:304: rang gi rigs kyi dbang bskur bya //
NG0713:305: rdo rje dril bu cod can dang *//
NG0713:306: phyag rgya sngags kyi rjes gnang dang *//
NG0713:307: thabs dang shes rab bde ba'i rgyun //
NG0713:309: rang gi thig le gnang ba sbyin //
NG0713:310: dus 'di thams cad tshe ring dang *//
NG0713:311: gdon dang 'byung po zhi ba dang *//
NG0713:312: klu yang de yi dbang du 'dus //
NG0713:313: lha yang de yis bsgo ba nyan //
NG0713:314: bgegs rigs rnams kyang tshul bzhin gus //
NG0713:316: dam med slob dpon brnyas byed pa //
NG0713:317: dmyal ba chen por de ltung ngo *//
NG0713:319: dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o //    // de nas dkyil 'khor de dag la //
NG0713:320: tshig gis mnyes par bya ba'i phyir //
NG0713:321: ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
NG0713:322: de nas na ga pu tsa ya //
NG0713:323: nyi ma lta bu'i 'od mchog gis //
NG0713:324: yi ge rab mchog mthing kha yi //
NG0713:325: ram dang yam gis sreg sbyangs te //
NG0713:326: sngon dang dmar dang dkyil 'khor nyid //
NG0713:327: de stengs thod mchog ka pa la //
NG0713:328: gsang ba'i yi ge bcu las ni //
NG0713:329: sha lnga bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga //
NG0713:330: ye shes rang byung grub pa'i rdzas //
NG0713:331: bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul //
NG0713:332: me tog sngo dang 'dod yon dang *//
NG0713:333: bza' dang bca' ba'i tshogs rnams ni //
NG0713:334: gsang bdag gtum po gnod sbyin tshogs //
NG0713:335: mnyes pa'i kha zas sbyin par bya //
NG0713:336: klu rnams la yang dkar gsum sbyin //
NG0713:337: gnod sbyin rnams la bza' dang @#//
NG0713:339: longs spyod lhab lhub rgyan gyis mchod //
NG0713:340: mnyes na 'dod pa sbyin par bya //
NG0713:342: mchod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o // // de
NG0713:343: nas yang gsang bdag nyid kyis gzhi'i tshig 'di ched
NG0713:344: du brjod do // dngos grub gzhi 'dzin bla ma dam pa bkur //
NG0713:345: sngags dang phyag rgya mi shig cing *//
NG0713:346: mi smin rnams la gsang mi bsgrags //
NG0713:347: lcags kyu lnga dang grub pa bcu rnams bza' //
NG0713:348: phyag rgya mi 'gom mnyes pa mi gcag go / me tog sngo dang bdug pa kun byed tshogs //
NG0713:349: nga rgyal ldan pas thun mtshams rtag tu gzung *//
NG0713:350: de la gnas na 'bras bu myur du byed //
NG0713:353: dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o //    // de nas bsrung ba bya ba ni //
NG0713:354: dus tshod shis dang 'khor lo'i rgyu //
NG0713:355: 'bru gsum sho sha dbang chen khyung *//
NG0713:356: rigs bzhi'i khyung dang rten 'brel sngags //
NG0713:357: a li ka lis bskor ba dang *//
NG0713:358: ye shes spyan drangs bkug bstim la //
NG0713:359: sngags kyi gzugs su byung ba dang *//
NG0713:360: mchod cing gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad //
NG0713:361: gsol btab gril la mgul du gdags //
NG0713:362: chos srung rnams kyis srung bar 'gyur //
NG0713:364: srung ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o ///
NG0713:365: / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de dag gi phyag rgya 'di dag gsungs so //
NG0713:366: rdo rje bsdams pa las gur chung gzhibs //
NG0713:367: khro mo gung tshigs bar pa dgug / the bong mthe chung rtse lnga bsgreng *//
NG0713:368: gtum po chen po'i phyag rgya'o //
NG0713:369: rdo rje bsdams la gung tshigs bcag / rta gdong chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
NG0713:370: mthe bo lto sbyar khrigs gnyis brnol //
NG0713:371: rdo rje khyung gshog phyag rgya'o //
NG0713:372: rdo rje dam tshig sku gsungs thugs //
NG0713:373: nyin re phyag rgya lan gsum bca' //
NG0713:375: phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o // // de
NG0713:376: nas rdo rje gnod sbyin rnams kyis nyid kyi sku
NG0713:377: la bstod pa // lcang lo can gyi pho brang na //
NG0713:378: gsang bdag gtum po gos sngon can //
NG0713:380: khro rgyal sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0713:381: dpa' bo chen po thabs brnyes pa //
NG0713:382: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
NG0713:383: rdo rje mchog gi lam ston pa //
NG0713:384: rdo rje rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod //
NG0713:385: ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba //
NG0713:386: theg chen rtogs pa khong du tshud //
NG0713:387: gsang ba'i rgyal po gsang sngags 'dzin //
NG0713:388: gsang ba'i bdag po'i sku la bstod //
NG0713:389: stobs po che la drag shul che //
NG0713:391: bcom ldan rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NG0713:392: hri gsung las rta mgrin sprul pa ni //
NG0713:393: ye shes rig pa nyid las skyes pa'i lha //
NG0713:394: rang byung thugs rje'i dpal la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NG0713:395: khrom thugs las byang khyung bskyed pa ni //
NG0713:398: mthu stobs dpal ldan rdo rje khyung *//
NG0713:399: mkha' lding rgyal po tshangs pa'i bya //
NG0713:400: mkha' lding nyid du sku sprul nas //
NG0713:401: gdug pa'i klu rnams 'dul mdzad pa //
NG0713:402: thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NG0713:403: ces bstod pas mnyes pa chen pos khyab par gyur to //
NG0713:405: bstod pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o ///
NG0713:406: / de nas srin mo glog 'phreng can //
NG0713:407: nag mo 'jigs ma drel zhon ma //
NG0713:409: u pa kar ni la sogs dang *//
NG0713:410: bu rnams lnga brgya'i 'khor gyis bskor //
NG0713:412: rdo rje 'chang la mchod byas nas //
NG0713:413: rang gi snying po 'di phul lo //
NG0713:414: rag mo tsab mo thang mu le pi sti ta ru lu ni thun b+h+yo /
NG0713:415: de dag srog gi snying po ste //
NG0713:416: dmod pa'i drag sngags 'di dag go / ma ma rag sha ma ra ya /
NG0713:419: pra ma ta na mi pra sad badzra kyi mon ta /
NG0713:420: a hang pra ha ra pra ku ma /
NG0713:422: tha da mu tra bag sha nan //
NG0713:423: hum mtha' d+ha sha 'dri ba rag+sha thun b+h+yo rgyob /
NG0713:424: ka ma ru ru ma ra ya pram /
NG0713:425: che ge mo thun khas rbad rbad 'di dag dug gi spu gri ste //
NG0713:426: rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes su gsol //
NG0713:428: srin mo glog 'phreng gi drag sngags kyi le'u ste
NG0713:429: bcu drug pa'o // // e ma dpa' bo rdo
NG0713:430: rje 'chang *// gzhan yang bdag ni dug lnga'i bdag / lnga lnga nyon mongs lnga 'phel byed //
NG0713:431: mtshon lngas bsrung dang thun dang dbab //
NG0713:432: 'dod chags khrag mtsho zhe sdang dug / gti mug bdud rtsi phrag dog sman //
NG0713:433: nga rgyal rin chen sna tshogs mtsho //
NG0713:434: rgyal blon 'bangs kyi gtso bo ni //
NG0713:435: mtsho lnga la yang gsum gsum mo //
NG0713:436: de la 'dod chags khrag mtsho ni //
NG0713:437: skyes pa'i gri khrag rgyal po ste //
NG0713:438: khyi dmar khrag ni blon po'o //
NG0713:439: rta nag khrag ni 'bangs yin te //
NG0713:440: de la sogs pa rnyed tshad dmangs //
NG0713:441: 'dod chags khrag gi thun chen dbab //
NG0713:442: gdug pa zhe sdang dug gi mtsho //
NG0713:444: sha la nag po blon po'o //
NG0713:445: spyang dug pa ni de yi dmangs //
NG0713:446: gzhan yang dug sna tshogs tshad do //
NG0713:447: zhe sdang dug gi thun chen dbab //
NG0713:448: gti mug chen po bdud rtsi yi //
NG0713:449: skyed byed dkar dmar rgyal po ste //
NG0713:450: rgyal rigs rnam snang blon po'o //
NG0713:451: dge sbyor mi skyong de yis dmangs //
NG0713:452: klad gzhungs la sogs 'tshogs tshang bsog / gti mug chen po'i thun chen dbab //
NG0713:453: phrag dog sman gyi thun la ni //
NG0713:454: sman gyi rgyal po gu gul te //
NG0713:455: blon po gla rtsi shing kun dmangs //
NG0713:456: 'bras gsum la sogs tsha ba gsum //
NG0713:457: gzhan yang sman du grags tshad bsog / phrag dog chen po'i thun dbab pa'o //
NG0713:458: nga rgyal rin chen sna tshogs thun //
NG0713:459: rin chen rgyal po theg lcags te //
NG0713:460: de yi blon po gri lcags so //
NG0713:461: dmangs ni khro chu nag po ste //
NG0713:462: de la sogs pa rin chen dang *//
NG0713:463: gcan gzan sder mo mche ba rwa //
NG0713:467: zangs lcags smyug dong nang du blug / bsrung dang thun ni dbab pa la //
NG0713:468: bsri dang bzhugs pa skabs kyis shes //
NG0713:469: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis //
NG0713:470: 'khor rnams bsrung ba zhes su gsol //
NG0713:471: de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis //
NG0713:472: rdo rje me stag rab 'phro ba //
NG0713:473: rdo rje srin mo'i 'khor bzhag nas //
NG0713:474: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di byon no //
NG0713:476: om badzra ki li ki la ya /
NG0713:477: tsan+d+ha tsan+d+ha mi li mi li ban+d+ha ban+d+ha na ga ban+d+ha ni swa ha /
NG0713:478: rdo rje srin mo khyod kyis dug lnga'i mtsho lnga las rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sngags de ni //
NG0713:479: pho mo gang bsrung khri tsho re //
NG0713:480: gzhon nu rnams la stong tshe re //
NG0713:481: byol song rnams la brgya bzlas la //
NG0713:483: zho chang bsrung sogs nyi shu gcig / gang la btags pa de dag ni //
NG0713:484: bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar bar mthong *//
NG0713:485: sde brgyad gang yang 'da' mi nus //
NG0713:486: klu dang sa bdag smos ci dgos //
NG0713:487: hom zor sbyin sreg mnan gtad dang *//
NG0713:489: rdo rje me 'thab byed pa dang *//
NG0713:490: dregs pa pho mo 'khol ba rnams //
NG0713:491: 'di las lhag pa gzhan med do //
NG0713:492: rdo rje gtum po me 'od 'bar ba'i rgyud las /
NG0713:493: srin mo nam gru mtsho lnga'i le'u ste bcu bdun
NG0713:494: pa'o // // rdo rje gtum po me 'od 'bar
NG0713:495: ba rdo rje gnam lcags thog 'bebs kyi rgyud /
NG0713:496: phyag na rdo rje brgya rtsa gnyis pa'i le'u ste phyung ba'o //
NG0713:497: rdo rje gtum po sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud me 'od 'bar ba zhes bya ba /
NG0713:498: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa rdzogs so ///
NG0713:499: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bde ba'i myu gu dang */
NG0713:500: cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o //
NG0713:501: o rgyan thor cog nag po dang */
NG0713:502: rgya gar da na da la dang */
NG0713:503: bal po ba su da ra las /
